title.native: バトルガール ハイスクール

description:
Mysterious invaders have attacked the Earth! As the Irousu roam the conquered lands, mankind has been driven back, but there’s one last weapon that may still turn the tide: super-powered schoolgirls! At schools like the Shinjugamine Girls Academy, elite classes of Star Guardians alternate between regular schoolwork and learning to kick Irousu behind. It’s a duty that the members of the Shinjugamine Hoshimori force, like freshman Miki Hoshitsuki, take seriously, but as they’re basically normal girls who just happen to get their powers from a magic tree, there are normal life issues they have to contend with as well. With the arrival of their latest mysterious recruit, however, things are about to get deadly serious.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

node.description: Started off as a composite artist.

Yousuke Kuroda is a Japanese screenwriter. He is affiliated with Studio Orphee and serves as the inside director (board of directors member).

Kuroda is a prolific writer in the anime industry. Having authored and scripted numerous anime series. Including several original productions. Some of the most notable are Infinite Ryvius, Scryed, Please☆Teacher!, Mobile Suit Gundam 00, and Waiting in the Summer.

In 2003, he won the Individual Award at the 8th Animation Kobe event.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_silmeria_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/_silmeria_/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/54631733)
Hideki Furukawa is an animator and animation director.
**Imai Mami (今井雅美)** is a Japanese animator and animation director.
**Imai Mami (今井雅美)** is a Japanese animator and animation director.
**Ooishi Yasuyuki** is a Japanese director, episode director and storyboard artist.

__[Profile (Barnstorm Design Labo)](http://barnstorm-design-labo.com/member/yuri.html)__

__Satoshi Yuri__ is a Japanese former mangaka, illustrator, character designer and background artist.

__[Profile](http://barnstorm-design-labo.com/member/miyao.html)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sbs_miyao)__ __Yoshikazu Miyao__ is a Japanese director, mechanical designer, episode director and storyboard artist. He currently works for studio Gonzo, and is affiliated with [Barnstorm Design Labo](https://anilist.co/staff/146502/Barnstorm-Design-Labo).
